name: Thu Le
about:
I have over 3 years of experience working in auditing services.

Currently, I work as a senior audit associate in Ernst&Young Vietnam, auditing high-profile clients in various industries (FDI, private, public listed companies), and providing added values to clients via consultancy over accounting, tax regulations & operational effectiveness.

I am looking for a challenging position in finance field.

Competencies: accounting and tax, internal and external audit, financial reporting, leadership and teamworking skills.

experiences.description:
• Proactively deepening knowledge in auditing, accounting, tax regulations and corporate governance

• Performing audit procedures, communicating findings and raise recommendation to seniors and clients

• Supporting seniors in managing team and coaching junior staff
